panels.description:
Free space in / partition. 
<= 14.4Gb left - green.
<= 10.4Gb left - yellow.
<= 6.4Gb left - RED.
panels.title: RootFS free

panels.description: The main metrics for are bandwidth usage which comes from the netdev module, and is covered by node_network_receive_bytes_total and node_network_transmit_bytes_total. Both bits per second.
panels.title: Network packets

panels.description:
Officially the Raspberry Pi’s processor is built to withstand temperatures from -40°C to 85°C.

CPU Starts to throttle if temp raises higher that 80°C.

Anything below 50°C is normal computing temperature.
panels.title: CPU Temp

panels.description: Disk operations and FS free size
panels.title: Disk operations
